author: Nick C
comment: My favorite watch face and the only custom I use. Battery was approximately the same after my day of work compared to standard moto 360 faces, from the comments it seemed people had issue. Lots of customization, utility and it looks great. One annoying issue though, the time and date are on the bottom of the screen so when there's a notification (or in my case, Pandora which always shows) the most critical part is blocked. A nice option would be to put the battery displays on bottom and time on top. Please!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Nick, i will look into it when i have a chance, and want to give you  a special thanks for this nice review :)

title: The best

author: Matt Treasure
comment: Nice watch face but recently has become such a battery hog, I've had to stop using it. My Urbane would previously go 2, nearly 3 days without a charge, I don't get through a day with this face running. I've pared back some of the actions, like disable location and the ISS updates but it still kills the battery. Great looking but no longer useable unfortunately.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Matt.... if you want to email me about it i can try to help you out with a few steps to make sure all is in order. Thanks for the support.

title: Had to uninstall

author: Darren Pierce
comment: I don't like many watchfaces, but I love this one.  One request: Would like to be able to set the Digital Clock to an alternate time zone.  Even if it were just an hour offset ("+2 Hours" "-3 Hours" etc), would be sweet.  Cool watch face!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Darren, sure im always looking for ways to improve it. Ill keep working at it, and thanks for the support (gives me positive vibes!)

title: Awesome -- Just One Request

author: Dov Skipper
comment: I'm a bit of a watch face addict and can tell I'll be wearing this for a long time to come. Great theme colors and detail although it would be great to be able to zoom in on your location somehow I can't really see the UK from the distance it's set at. The news tickertape is a nice touch. Well done.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Dov, thanks for the great comment!! I see you truly like it and its extremely satisfying.

title: Super watch face

comment: Nice idea, but not an atlas. US centric. Doesn't adapt to anywhere out of North America. I'm Scottish, and it's not really got any relevance to me. I've uninstalled it.  Can I have a refund?

author: Victor Trevino
comment: I never review anything on the market place but i have to say this watch face is the best one out there. Good looking, smooth and informative interface.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Victor... you know, its quite awesome you let me know that. People like you give developers the positive energy they need to keep going. Class act! And thank YOU.

title: Best Watch Face I've come across

author: Fa Sa
comment: In monochrome mode the south pole appears as a large white mass, the white minute digits (which are also white) then disappear. In short, the digital time in ambient mode is totally useless unless you want to either chew through your battery with full color mode or use energy saving mode which is simple white digits on a plain black background.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Fa... not sure whats the issue but if you wanna send me a email about it maybe we can discuss it and find out what up... thanks for the review.. i always appreciate that you take the time :)

title: Ambient digital time unusable

author: Aiden Blake
comment: Couldn't get the watch face nor its companion app to install on my phone or watch at all. I unpaired the watch, reset it, and reinstalled everything and I still couldn't get it to work. I've never been this frustrated over a stupid watch face.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Aiden... This is not related to the watch face. But rather to Android wear making the delivery of it. For some ppl it takes a while for android wear to receive it and install it.

author: Peter Panman
comment: Just wanted to say thank you for the assist in getting it to work. I redownloaded it & it looks amazing! Awesome depth of customise options too.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Peter, im super happy you're all set! Thanks for the feedbacks.

title: Now it works! Awesome!

author: Glen M Uren
comment: Love it, nice and clear and lots of options for colour and activities. Is there anyway to keep ticker tape running all the time?

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Glen, ill work on it, thanks a lot for the comment!

title: Great watch face..

author: Corey Miecielica
comment: The tweaks, the functionality, the overall appearances of this watchface, all oh-so-good!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Corey, thanks for the awesome comment, its always appreciated.

title: Absolutely beautiful and so well made!

author: David Kamer
comment: couldnt get it working at first, but now it looks amazing!

author: Tony Pearce
comment: Took some time to settle and sync to where I am on the globe but now it has it's great!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Tony, im glad you're all set, thanks for the feedback's!

author: abhay mogal
comment: Cany seem to find the APp... Hi Phlash, it's been 7 days , I still don't see it on my Moto 360 2 ... is there a way to push it ...

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up abhay... Send me a email... I'll reply with reinstall instruction, Thanks for the comment.

title: Downloaded and installed but don't see it in the Apps on my S7

author: Adam Gordon
comment: App was a battery hog. When directly let developer know they blew me off and told me I was being dramatic

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: You are mad because i blocked you for been a stalker. My customers know i have stellar support.

author: Chief Bobwah
comment: Wush i could fix it.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Larry, if you have data turned off on the phone that GPS weather will not work and that Wifi has to be turned on for the network to work. Thanks for the feedback,  you can also email me if you want.

title: GPS says I'm in Florida.  I live in TEXAS!  😭

author: prakash chinni
comment: Please add second time zone for digital watch.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Prakash, noted..

author: John Barszowski
comment: I should get my cash back

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up John, whats up?

author: bharath chowdary
comment: Done payment, not getting installed.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up bharath, you can email me and we'll try to troubleshoot your issues. Make sure you have a Android Wear watch...

title: Not installed

author: Jeremy Tranter
comment: Great watch face but why don't the settings hold - pretty frustrating....

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jeremy, i can give you a few tips to make sure it works perfect, just email me about it... Thanks for the feedback's!

title: Settings don't hold?

author: AHMED REFFAT
comment: I wish the globe was rotating rather than being still

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up AHMED, i can't make it rotate right now because this watch is energy efficient and it would destroy it to have that going on. Thanks for the feedback and your opinion, i appreciate it.

title: Nice face

author: Major Rager
comment: one of the nicest watch faces out there by far.

author: Rod Adkins
comment: Great App

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Rod, thanks for the kind comment.. its appreciated!

author: Andy Tonks
comment: You have done it again with "ATLAS".  The "NAVI" watch face was my favourite but now i can't decide between this one and that now. Both are exquisite and so customizable to get the look you want. Keep up the good work. Oh.... and those with battery drain problems, turn off the ISS tracker until you want to use it as that helps significantly.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Andy, thanks for the support and the love... you make my day!!!!

author: Christopher Sciria
comment: I love the watch face, like a geochron but I have to nick it 2 stars because it's a battery drain. My watch went from 60% to 9% in less than 10 hours. There's no way I could go a full day between charging like a stock face. I use a Huawei watch. Improve battery life and it's 5 stars.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Christopher, they are ways to control your power usage and if you wanna email me we can talk about it... One thing i noticed is people tend to wanna look at their watch more when the face is super-extra-nice ;) and in turn have more power consumption. Thanks for the feedback its much appreciated.

author: Jason Platt
comment: This face looks fantastic and provides excellent info. I'm on my first day with it and can already tell it's killing my watch battery. Hopefully some optimizations are in the works.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jason, yeah i always keep working a them... there's a few things i can do to help maybe, just email me and we'll talk. Thanks for taking the time to leave a review!

title: Looks amazing, but it's thirsty.

author: Mark Stuvetraa
comment: Casio WSD-F10:  This has to be one of the sickest watch faces out there.  Awesome work.  The detail in the graphics is just amazing.  Love the battery meters for both the phone & watch as well as the Day/Night feature.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Mark, Well well.. thanks a lot for the awesome feedback i'll keep at it!!!

author: Rob Lewis
comment: Ignore me. Wasn't giving it time to update. Stellar work guys. It's the only non traditional watch face I'll have.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Rob... Glad to know you're set! Thanks for the comment.

author: Chris Woodhouse
comment: Awesome watchface looks really smart and works great so thanks! I thought it would be cool if there was something in the settings to allow you to change orientation or centre on a different place on the atlas, don't know if this is possible but would be very cool!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Chris, i will consider your suggestions, thanks so much for taking the time to share it with me and leave a comment. Its appreciated!

title: Awesome - suggestion

author: Ethan Clansky
comment: I like the map idea, but the hour + min hand look like their possessed after watch comes out of ambient mode, ripping around the screen until settling on current time. Please make them just snap to the current time, eliminate the issue.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Ethan... simply deactivate the "Hand Animations" in the analog clock settings... easy. Thanks for feedback!

author: Klaus Steinberg
comment: 'not feeling refreshed' // centering map on users correct location would make this actually useful  beyond esthetics. i will definitely look out for the bugfix and adapt my rating.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Klaus, just email me about it and we'll do some steps together to get you setup. Just let me know. Thanks for the feedback.

title: neither weather nor location works

author: Andrew Barker
comment: I have been using this face for less than a day. I do not know how much it affects battery life on my First Generation Moto 360 yet, what I do know is how much I love how it's a real time GeoChron for your wrist. This may be the first face to get me to move on from my Minimal and Elegant face. So far, it's incredibly beautiful and I look forward to seeing it every time I bring up my watch to read it. Beautiful face. Thanks!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Andrew, thanks for the kind words its nice to see someone that shares the vision :)

author: balentine chavez
comment: Can someone please make a watch face that while the watch isn't moving the watch hibernates or shuts battery to its lowest setting to conserve the battery or make an option to control power once it gets to a certain percent, it shuts down to just show time.great app.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Balentine, feel free to email me and ill see if i  can help you on this... Thanks for the feedback!

title: Almost!

author: Jim Thibault
comment: Just found it installed it,  ambient mode can I see full minute and hour hands, I changed it to Digital because I did not like the short analog hands.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jim, ill look into it thanks for taking the time to leave a comment!

author: Gürkan Ezerçe
comment: One of my best watchfaces so far! Like the city lights and day-night themes.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Gürkan, Thanks a lot for this :) i appreciate the love.

author: Cary Paddick
comment: I love the look and feel of this watchface but it seems the ISS is not in sync with its actual location. I often watch it overhead and always track its location but on this app its nowhere near where it shows on the watch

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Cary, would you mind sending me a email about it, i'd love to have more details... ( its kinda so cool to talk about a space station anyways :)

title: Nice watchface but

author: Claudio Macieira
comment: It says its been installed on my phone but no where to be found?  What is your email  How do you uninstall something you can't find

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content:
Word up Claudio, on this very page there's a "Send Email" button...
You're not really trying are you?
Thanks for the comment.

author: Jimmy Martinez
comment: I really like this face. Worth the money for sure. So cool. We shall see what it does to my batt life but that matters little when I look at this face

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jimmy, it should be super smooth on bat since its the phone that does all the work. We call it a companion app, its basically where a lot of the calculations are done. Thanks so much for taking the time to leave a feedback i really appreciate it :)

title: Worth the money!

author: Trapper Trinkaus
comment: Give it a few minutes after download, a notification will show up on your watch.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Trapper... thanks for the love its always appreciated.

title: Great watch

author: ChezJM D
comment: Love it, very smooth, just found settings for the ISS in Android wear app on my phone. Love ISS on my wrist, thank you Phlash!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Janet, very nice to know you like it. A big thank you for taking the time to let me know... brightens my day :)

title: Superb Dev!
